title: Divisors of factorial
text:
Given a number, find the total number of divisors of the factorial of the number.Since the answer can be very large, print answermodulo109+7.InputThe first line contains T, number of testcases.T lines follows each containing the number N.OutputPrint T lines of output each containing the answer.ExampleInput:3
2
3
4Output:2
4
8Constraints1 ≤ T ≤ 5000 ≤ N ≤ 50000
